docs.snippet: The rush to build casinos is only intensifying in the region, which is widely regarded as the most competitive market in the country despite flat or falling gambling revenues....
docs.lead_paragraph: The rush to build casinos is only intensifying in the region, which is widely regarded as the most competitive market in the country despite flat or falling gambling revenues.
docs.abstract: Pennsylvania Gaming Control Board awards license to joint venture of Cordish Companies and Greenwood Gaming and Entertainment to build Philadelphia area's fourth gambling hall and 13th casino in the state; project is latest entrance in increasingly competitive world of East Coast gambling.

headline.main: Philadelphia Casino Project Adds to Frenzy in Northeast Gambling Market
headline.print_headline: New Casino Project Enters Stormy Northeast Market

docs.snippet: Yankees President Randy Levine offered a succinct response when asked what he thought about the Marlins and outfielder Giancarlo Stanton breaking the record for richest contract that had been held by Alex Rodriguez for more than 13 years until las...
docs.lead_paragraph: Yankees President Randy Levine offered a succinct response when asked what he thought about the Marlins and outfielder Giancarlo Stanton breaking the record for richest contract that had been held by Alex Rodriguez for more than 13 years until last spring.

headline.main: Big Deals on Minds of Owners During MLB Meetings
headline.print_headline: Big Deals on Minds of Owners During MLB Meetings

docs.snippet: In his single term as governor, Mr. Sanders cautiously navigated the racial turmoil of the time, promoting Georgia as a region of relative calm amid the storms of the South....
docs.lead_paragraph: In his single term as governor, Mr. Sanders cautiously navigated the racial turmoil of the time, promoting Georgia as a region of relative calm amid the storms of the South.
docs.abstract: Carl E Sanders, governor of Georgia in mid-1960s who helped spur growth of Atlanta and took relatively progressive stance on race and segregation, dies at age 89.

headline.main: Carl Sanders, 89, Dies; Led Georgia in ’60s
headline.print_headline: Carl Sanders, 89, Dies; Led Georgia in ’60s
